about.title: Who are we?
about.description: Impact Christian Center of Togo is a church where God's love transforms ordinary people into true conquerors, committed to training disciples and impacting society through the love and truth of the Gospel. It brings together a living community, passionate about God's presence, service, and personal development under the leadership of Pastor Herman FEHA. To facilitate access to worship services and events, the church provides a carpooling application.

who_can_use.title: So, Who can use it?
who_can_use.subtitle: For all who serve and participate in church activities.

faithful.title: The Faithful
faithful.description: All members of ICC churches in Togo

stars.title: The S.T.A.R
stars.description: Servants in the departments of ICC churches

impact_family.title: Impact Family
impact_family.description: Leaders in ICC churches (Pastors, Assistant Pastors)

shepherds.title: The Shepherds
shepherds.description: Leaders in ICC churches (Pastors, Assistant Pastors)

what_we_offer.title: What we offer
what_we_offer.subtitle: Share your rides, live in fellowship, and join every service without worry, thanks to the solidarity carpooling of Impact Christian Center of Togo. Come share moments of faith and brotherhood!

carpooling.title: Activity-linked carpooling
carpooling.description: Offer or request a ride for your church programs: services, meetings, rehearsals, impact families, departments, etc.

communication.title: Communication and integrated Map
communication.description: Group chat between driver and passengers, trip tracking on the map, driver's position, route and estimated time of arrival.

enjoy_app.title: Enjoy the application
enjoy_app.description: When each new activity is created, a notification is sent to users by email and in the application.

hero.title: Join your church programs with ease.
hero.description: Share your rides, live in fellowship, and join every service without worry and without any cost thanks to the solidarity carpooling of Impact Christian Center of Togo. Users from all churches can switch or request carpooling.
